message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. Consider that the value of the money will decrease over time, especially for you.
I think we can both do better. I'm willing to offer you 40% to get this over with quickly, as the value of the money decreases with each passing round.
Bob, I understand the time pressure, but your offer wasn't fair to me. I propose a 45/55 split in your favor. Let's close this deal and avoid further devaluation.
